metadata.title: Arctic data: NOGAP chemical and physical data
metadata.description: Physical and geochemical data collected during 1986-1996 under the NOGaP Program in the Mackenzie Shelf and Beaufort Sea areas of the Western Canadian Arctic.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Supports scientific and environmental research.

Supplemental Information: Custom software is available for use with this dataset.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None planned

Access constraints: Departmental

Use constraints: None

Distribution liability: These data are provided "as-is".
